definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to water at the mouth/to drool
to drool (over) (idiom)/to yearn for/to covet/to crave
to drool with desire (idiom); to envy/to hunger for
to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory

sentences.english: Hang down on ear object the clear lapidary spirit gas like water is threatening.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵上垂坠水滴般清透的宝石灵气逼人。

sentences.english: Two plaits fall over her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 两条辫子垂在她的肩上。

sentences.english: His left arm hung slackly and his hand trembled a good deal .
sentences.chinese: 他的左臂松驰地垂着，手抖得厉害。

sentences.english: And see Morningside sentence, not the first tears down Yin.
sentences.chinese: 及睹晨兴句，未吟先涕垂。

sentences.english: Since she has lost weight that skirt bags on her.
sentences.chinese: 因为她减肥了，她穿那条裙子显得太松垂了。

sentences.english: Her dark, human like hair, hung in loose curls around her almost angelic face.
sentences.chinese: 她乌黑的如同真人般的卷发垂在天使般的面庞边。

sentences.english: Guan Tang Shi Cao said the Chinese opera, literature, classical masterpieces hanging.
sentences.chinese: 关汤戏曲施曹说，文学杰作垂古典。

sentences.english: His beard fell to his chest.
A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.english: I'd love to  gaze upon that  enchanting beard over a delicious  beverage.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看你那迷人的胡子垂在美酒上的样子。

sentences.english: Bird is like clouds hang down the wings, although nine miles can also soared.
sentences.chinese: 巨鸟有如垂天之云般的翅膀，虽九万里亦可扶摇直上。

sentences.english: He sat down heavily, his shoulders drooping, his arms falling between his outspread legs.
sentences.chinese: 他颓然坐下，肩膀耷拉着，双臂垂在叉开的。

sentences.english: This is an architecture with classical Chinese garden style.
sentences.chinese: 中式园林建筑单层硬山卷棚垂脊顶。

sentences.english: A small heart in Chalk White crystal dangles gracefully around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 小心脏以粉笔白色结晶优雅地垂在她的脖子上。

sentences.english: Tidal pumping and vertical shearing are the principal factors leading to distinctions.
sentences.chinese: 潮泵作用和垂向切变作用是造成两者差别的主要原因。

definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor

variant of 挽[wan3]/to draw (a cart)/to lament the dead
